name: Ninja Spy - Star Bullets
description:
Use your Ninja Stars to take down the enemy and save the girl. You can choose to save the girl without taking out the enemies, but you will earn more stars if you are able to take out the enemies and then save the girl. Use physics to throw the star to your desired location. Only the Ninja Spy Masters will be able to beat all 200+ levels!

Features:
- Awesome Graphics
- Physics style shooter
- Exciting theme
- 200+ Levels
- Upgrades & more!
